name: RPG Attack Generator
description: Generates RPG attacks given a weapon
context:
[ RANDOM ATTACK GENERATOR ]
[ Given a player and an enemy, generates a player attack description and deducts the damages/wounds and status ]

list.name: Bunny
list.description: You promptly cut the bunny in two, killing it instantly.

list.name: Wolf
list.description: You attack the wolf with your wooden axe, which does almost no damage at all.

list.name: Dragon
list.description: You jump on the head of the dragon and heroically sink your legendary sword in its skull and melt its brain, killing it instantly.

list.name: Sheep
list.description: You hit the sheep with the rusty spoon. It barely seems bothered by your attack.

list.name: Bear
list.description: You shoot the bear with your enchanted crossbow, and somehow hit it just between the two eyes. The bear falls onto the floor, dead.

list.name: Troll
list.description: You shoot an arrow at the troll with your bow. The arrow hits the troll in the arm, but the troll is totally undamaged.

list.name: Jelly
list.description: You throw the magic blade into the jelly's mouth, where it sticks. The jelly dies.

list.name: Centaur
list.description: You stab the centaur in the chest, and manage to pierce his armor. However, you don't actually kill him. He gets up and continues fighting.
